text: It is better to have loved and lost than never to have loved at all.
author: Alfred Lord Tennyson

text: The pain of parting is nothing to the joy of meeting again.
author: Charles Dickens

text: I used to think the worst thing in life was to end up all alone. It's not. The worst thing in life is to end up with people who make you feel all alone.
author: Robin Williams

text: The best way to heal a broken heart, it turns out, is to find a way to move past the hurt.
author: Mary Kay Andrews

text: You never lose by loving. You always lose by holding back.
author: Barbara De Angelis

text: Sometimes good things fall apart so better things can fall together.
author: Marilyn Monroe

text: The heart was made to be broken.
author: Oscar Wilde

text: Relationships end, but they don't end your life.
author: Steve Martin

text: You can't buy love, but you can pay heavily for it.
author: Henny Youngman

text: Letting go means to come to the realization that some people are a part of your history, but not a part of your destiny.
author: Steve Maraboli

text: You can't keep dancing with the devil and ask why you're still in hell.
author: Unknown

text: It's sad when someone you know becomes someone you knew.
author: Henry Rollins

text: When I get sad, I stop being sad and be awesome instead.
author: Neil Patrick Harris

text: You can't give your heart to a wild thing.
author: Truman Capote

text: The saddest thing about love is that not only that it cannot last forever, but that heartbreak is soon forgotten.
author: William Faulkner

text: If you love someone, set them free. If they come back, they're yours; if they don't, they never were.
author: Richard Bach

text: You are responsible for your own happiness. If you expect others to make you happy, you will always be disappointed.
author: Unknown

text: Life always waits for some crisis to occur before revealing itself at its most brilliant.
author: Paulo Coelho

text: Nothing in the universe can stop you from letting go and starting over.
author: Guy Finley

text: The hardest part about walking away from someone is the part where you realize that, no matter how slowly you go, they will never run after you.
author: Unknown

text: The pain of a breakup is not the end of the road. It's just a detour.
author: Marjorie Pay Hinckley

text: Sometimes, two people have to fall apart to realize how much they need to fall back together.
author: Colleen Hoover

text: Love is never lost. If not reciprocated, it will flow back and soften and purify the heart.
author: Washington Irving

text: The only way to get over a broken heart is to find a new one.
author: Jamie Ford

text: It is better to be alone than to be with someone who makes you feel alone.
author: Robin Williams

text: You can't go back and change the beginning, but you can start where you are and change the ending.
author: C.S. Lewis

text: The greatest gift you can give someone is your own personal development. I used to say, "If you will take care of me, I will take care of you." Now I say, "I will take care of me for you, if you will take care of you for me."
author: Jim Rohn

text: Don't cry because it's over, smile because it happened.
author: Dr. Seuss

text: Sometimes good things fall apart so better things can come together.
author: Marilyn Monroe

text: Sometimes good things fall apart so better things can fall together.
author: Marilyn Monroe

text: It is better to have loved and lost than never to have loved at all.
author: Alfred Lord Tennyson

text: Sometimes the person you want most is the person you're best without.
author: Anonymous

text: Breaking up is like having the worst nightmare after having the best dream.
author: Anonymous

text: It's better to be unhappy alone than unhappy with someone.
author: Marilyn Monroe

text: The most painful goodbyes are the ones that are never said and never explained.
author: Anonymous

text: You can't start the next chapter of your life if you keep re-reading the last one.
author: Anonymous

text: You can love them, forgive them, want good things for them...but still move on without them.
author: Mandy Hale

text: Some things are just not meant to be.
author: Anonymous

text: When one door closes, another opens; but we often look so long and so regretfully upon the closed door that we do not see the one which has opened for us.
author: Alexander Graham Bell

text: Never regret yesterday. Life is in you today, and you make your tomorrow.
author: L. Ron Hubbard

text: The hardest part about breaking up is letting go of the last piece of your heart.
author: Anonymous

text: A broken heart is just the growing pains necessary so that you can love more completely when the real thing comes along.
author: J.S.B. Morse

text: It's painful to see someone you love with someone else, but it's more painful to know that someone else is making them happier than you ever did.
author: Anonymous

text: The only way to truly move on from a bad relationship is to learn from it, let go, and never look back.
author: Anonymous

text: Sometimes we must undergo hardships, breakups, and narcissistic wounds, which shatter the flattering image that we had of ourselves, in order to discover two truths: that we are not who we thought we were; and that the loss of a cherished pleasure is not necessarily the loss of true happiness and well-being.
author: Jean-Yves Leloup

text: Never let a bad person change your inner goodness.
author: Karen Salmansohn

text: Some of us think holding on makes us strong, but sometimes it is letting go.
author: Hermann Hesse

text: Don't cry because it's over, smile because it happened.
author: Dr. Seuss

text: A breakup is like a broken mirror. It is better to leave it broken than to hurt yourself trying to fix it.
author: Anonymous

text: Pain is inevitable. Suffering is optional.
author: M. Kathleen Casey

text: It's not the breakup that hurts the most, but the post-traumatic stress that follows it.
author: Susan J. Elliott

text: You may think the worst thing in life is losing someone you love. But I think the worst thing is losing yourself in the process of loving someone too much.
author: Julie Johnson

text: I used to think that asking for help was a sign of weakness, but then I learned that the strongest people are the ones who ask for help when they need it.
author: Unknown

text: Hearts will never be practical until they are made unbreakable.
author: The Wizard of Oz

text: It hurts to let go, but sometimes it hurts more to hold on.
author: Anonymous

text: I'm thankful for my struggle because without it, I wouldn't have stumbled across my strength.
author: Anonymous
